name: 50/50 burger

categories.name: Sandwich
categories.short_desc: Health is merely the slowest way someone can die

desc: Half ground bacon, half ground beef burger patty developed by Scott Slater for Slater’s 50/50 restaurant. Another variety is half kangaroo meat and half bacon.

name: Angus burger

categories.name: Sandwich
categories.short_desc: Health is merely the slowest way someone can die

desc: A hamburger made using beef from Angus cattle. The name Angus burger is used by several fast-food hamburger chains for one or more premium burgers; however, it does not belong to any single company. Pre-made frozen Angus burgers are increasingly available from retailers.

name: Australasian hamburgers

categories.name: Sandwich
categories.short_desc: Health is merely the slowest way someone can die

desc: Popular regional hamburger ingredients in Australia and New Zealand include canned beetroot and pineapple. Pictured is a burger with slices of canned beetroot within it.

name: Cheeseburger

categories.name: Sandwich
categories.short_desc: Health is merely the slowest way someone can die

desc: Hamburger accompanied with melted cheese. The term itself is a portmanteau of the words cheese and hamburger. The cheese is usually sliced, then added a short time before the hamburger finishes cooking to allow it to melt.

name: Rice burger

categories.name: Sandwich
categories.short_desc: Health is merely the slowest way someone can die

desc: Style of hamburger in which the bun is a compressed cake of rice. The MOS Burger fast-food restaurant chain introduced the rice burger in 1987, and it has become a popular food item in East Asia.

name: Salmon burger

categories.name: Sandwich
categories.short_desc: Health is merely the slowest way someone can die

desc: Fishcake made mostly from salmon in the style of a hamburger. Salmon burgers are especially common in Alaska where they are routinely offered as an alternative to beef hamburgers.

name: Steak burger

categories.name: Sandwich
categories.short_desc: Health is merely the slowest way someone can die

desc: Typically prepared with ground, sliced or minced beefsteak meat. Additional meats are also used.

name: Veggie burger

categories.name: Sandwich
categories.short_desc: Health is merely the slowest way someone can die

desc: Veggie burger, garden burger, or tofu burger uses a meat analogue, a meat substitute such as tofu, textured vegetable protein, seitan (wheat gluten), Quorn, beans, grains or an assortment of vegetables, which are ground up and formed into patties.

name: Teriyaki burger

categories.name: Sandwich
categories.short_desc: Health is merely the slowest way someone can die

desc: Teriyaki burger refers to a variety of hamburger either topped with teriyaki sauce or with the sauce worked into the ground meat patty.

name: Steamed cheeseburger

categories.name: Sandwich
categories.short_desc: Health is merely the slowest way someone can die

desc: Instead of being fried in a pan or grilled on a grill, a steamed cheeseburger is steamed in a stainless-steel cabinet containing trays that hold either a hamburger patty or a piece of cheese.

name: Slugburger

categories.name: Sandwich
categories.short_desc: Health is merely the slowest way someone can die

desc: Traditional southern delicacy found in northeast Mississippi, particularly Corinth. Consisting of a patty made from a mixture of beef or pork and an inexpensive extender such as soybeans, it is deep fried in oil.

desc: Chocolate ice cream cone I bought at Camp Manitoulin for a $1 donation. It was sort of icey. For Macro Mondays Drips Drops Splashes.

name: Americano

categories.name: Coffe
categories.short_desc: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food

desc: An affogato (Italian, drowned) is a coffee-based beverage. It usually takes the form of a scoop of vanilla gelato or ice cream topped with a shot of hot espresso. Some variations also include a shot of Amaretto or other liqueur.

name: Caffé Latte

categories.name: Coffe
categories.short_desc: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food

desc: Latte art Coffee and milk have been part of European cuisine since the 17th century. Caffè latte, Milchkaffee, café au lait and café con leche are domestic terms of traditional ways of drinking coffee, usually as part of breakfast in the home.

name: Caffé Corretto

categories.name: Coffe
categories.short_desc: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food

desc: Caffè corretto is an Italian beverage that consists of a shot of espresso with a shot of liquor, usually grappa, and sometimes sambuca or brandy.
